summary: The child found juggling fun but scary, especially the part with the balloon. The child enjoyed playing tic-tac-toe and a game called'mash the pillow' with bowling pins. The child sometimes stutters but it's hard to notice and is easier to talk in quiet environments. The child finds loud noises difficult to handle and can make it harder to talk. The child has been to speech therapy many times and finds it mostly fun, especially the games.
quotes: I stutter sometimes but it's kinda on the but it's hard to notice sometimes
well the playing and the games is the most funnest part
